creditline: Gift of the Miyashita Family and the Glenda and Richard Struthers Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: flattened cube form; colored horizontal bands with uneven edges (like torn paper) in shades of blue, with darker blue at bottom and lighter blue at top; interior of vessel has similar bands in pink and pale yellow with pale blue at top
markings: on underside: label with Japanese text
title: Distant
